Title: The Rainmaker.

Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=BdeLDQAAQBAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Abandoning his aspirations about living the good life, novice Memphis lawyer Rudy Baylor fears he will lose everything in the face of a pivotal case that could cost him his life or turn him into the biggest rainmaker in the land as he stumbles upon a huge case of insurance fraud in which he must go head to head with one of the most powerful defense attorneys and industries in America.
